H0.text: when was the first nuclear power plant opened. United Kingdom

H1.text: when was the first nuclear power plant opened. United States

H2.text: when was the first nuclear power plant opened. Canada

H3.text: when was the first nuclear power plant opened. the USSR

A4.text: Obninsk was connected to the power grid in June 1954

A5.text: The first commercial nuclear station in the United States was the Shippingport Reactor, operational in December 1957

A6.text: The world's first commercial nuclear power station, Calder Hall at Windscale, England was connected to the national power grid on 27 August 1956

A7.text: The first nuclear power plant constructed in the Soviet Union was the Obninsk Nuclear Power Plant, built near Moscow on June 26, 1954
